## ğŸš€ Quick Install

```bash
composer config repositories.laravel-ai-chatbot vcs https://github.com/saurabhshukla-developer/laravel-ai-chatbot
composer require saurabhshukla-developer/laravel-ai-chatbot:dev-master
```
